message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiation at $1,800,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,500,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your position, but $1,800,000 is still quite a ways off. How about we meet in the middle at $1,650,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and would like to counter with an offer of $1,600,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
